typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DiagnosisConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for diagnoses.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DiagnosisCodeConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for diagnoses given by their code.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DiagnosisSpecialConcept
typeDescription.description: Special induced Concept type for diagnoses.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.CodingCandidateSpan
typeDescription.description: A text span that might contain a CodingCandidate.

featureDescription.name: additionalSpans
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation not in the initial span, which can influence the coding.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DiagnosisConceptCandidate
typeDescription.description: A text span that might contain a DiagnosisConcept.

featureDescription.name: additionalSpans
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation not in the initial span, which can influence the coding.

featureDescription.name: fragments
featureDescription.description: List of annotations in span excluding the undesired indicators (e.g. LateralityIndicator) .

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.CodingCandidateConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for coding candidates.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.CodingCandidate
typeDescription.description: A candidate for a DRG coding.

featureDescription.name: conceptID
featureDescription.description: The id of the coding candidate.

featureDescription.name: dictCanon
featureDescription.description: An optional preferred term corresponding to the given id.

featureDescription.name: span
featureDescription.description: An annotation representing the coded text span.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: The approach that generated this candidate.

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Coding candidate belongs to patient or other person (family anamnesis). Possible values include 'patient' or 'family'.

featureDescription.name: clinicalStatus
featureDescription.description: Clinical status of the coding candidate.

featureDescription.name: verificationStatus
featureDescription.description: Verification status of the coding candidate.

featureDescription.name: matchedTerm
featureDescription.description: Additional information about the match.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The kind of the CodingCandidate, i.e. 'ICD' or 'OPS'.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Diagnosis
typeDescription.description: The actual diagnosis containing the concept and additional information.

featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: The actual concept of the diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The laterality of the actual diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Diagnosis of patient or other person (family anamnesis). Possible values include 'patient' or 'family'.

featureDescription.name: onsetDate
featureDescription.description: The onset date of the diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The kind of the diagnosis. Possible values include 'main' or 'secondary'.

featureDescription.name: symptom
featureDescription.description: Reference to symptom nearby.

featureDescription.name: clinicalStatus
featureDescription.description: Clinical status of the actual diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: verificationStatus
featureDescription.description: Verification status of the actual diagnosis. Possible values: "NEGATED" if Concept is negated.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: The approach that generated this diagnosis annotation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.SymptomConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for symptoms.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.DiagnosisStatus
typeDescription.description: Clinical status (active, resolved) or verification status (assured, negated, unknown, ...) of a diagnosis.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.VerificationStatusIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a verification status of a diagnosis. Interpretation could be e.g. ASSURED, NEGATED, SUSPECTED etc.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ClinicalStatusIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for a clinical status of a diagnosis. Interpretation could be e.g. ACTIVE, RESOLVED etc.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoDiagnosis
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that this span is no part of a diagnosis.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoDiagnosisContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is no part of a diagnosis.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoDiagnosisContextBlocker
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby context is applicable for changing the semantic of the diagnosis.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHDDiagnosisConcept
typeDescription.description: Concept type for Graft-versus-Host-Disease diagnosis.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHDContinuanceStatus
typeDescription.description: (Temporal) Status of the GvHD diagnosis, i.e. acute, chronic.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHDGrade
typeDescription.description: Severity grade of the GvHD diagnosis, i.e. I, II, III, IV, limited, extended.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: Normalized value of GvHD in categories, i.e. I, II, III, IV, limited, extended.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHDStage
typeDescription.description: Stage of the GvHD, i.e. 1, 2, 3, 4.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: Stage of GvHD in integer categories, i.e. 1, 2, 3, 4.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHDOrgan
typeDescription.description: Organ diagnosed with GvHD, i.e. skin, liver.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: Normalized name of affected organ.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.GvHD
typeDescription.description: Annotation of a Graft-versus-Host-Disease diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: continuanceStatus
featureDescription.description: GvHD status, i.e. acute, chronic.

featureDescription.name: grade
featureDescription.description: Grade of the GvHD diagnosis, i.e. I, II, III, IV.

featureDescription.name: stage
featureDescription.description: Stage of the GvHD diagnosis, i.e. 1, 2, 3, 4 or limited, extensive.

featureDescription.name: organ
featureDescription.description: Organ diagnosed with GvHD, i.e. skin, liver.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: The date of the diagnosis.
